name: py-jinja2
description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.

dependencies.name: py-babel
dependencies.description:
Babel is an integrated collection of utilities that assist in
internationalizing and localizing Python applications, with an emphasis
on web-based applications.

dependent_to.name: py-cekit
dependent_to.description:
CEKit is a Container image creation tool. CEKit helps to build container
images from image definition files with strong focus on modularity and
code reuse.

dependent_to.name: py-flask-babel
dependent_to.description: Implements i18n and l10n support for Flask.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-functions-devops-build
dependent_to.description:
Python package for integrating Azure Functions with Azure DevOps.
Specifically made for the Azure CLI.

dependent_to.name: py-nbsphinx
dependent_to.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependent_to.name: py-make
dependent_to.description: Create project layout from jinja2 templates

dependent_to.name: py-multiqc
dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.

dependent_to.name: py-pynn
dependent_to.description:
A Python package for simulator-independent specification of neuronal
network models

dependent_to.name: edm4hep
dependent_to.description: Event data model of Key4hep.

dependent_to.name: py-mpld3
dependent_to.description:
An interactive D3js-based viewer which brings matplotlib graphics to the
browser.

dependent_to.name: py-pydap
dependent_to.description: An implementation of the Data Access Protocol.

dependent_to.name: py-jinja2-time
dependent_to.description: Jinja2 Extension for Dates and Times

dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit
dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.

dependent_to.name: py-nbdime
dependent_to.description: Diff and merge of Jupyter Notebooks

dependent_to.name: py-ansible
dependent_to.description:
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your
applications and systems easier to deploy.

dependent_to.name: py-gemini
dependent_to.description:
GEMINI (GEnome MINIng) is a flexible framework for exploring genetic
variation in the context of the wealth of genome annotations available
for the human genome.

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.

dependent_to.name: podio
dependent_to.description:
PODIO, or plain-old-data I/O, is a C++ library to support the creation
and handling of data models in particle physics.

dependent_to.name: magics
dependent_to.description:
Magics is the latest generation of the ECMWF's Meteorological plotting
software MAGICS. Although completely redesigned in C++, it is intended
to be as backwards-compatible as possible with the Fortran interface.

dependent_to.name: aws-parallelcluster
dependent_to.description:
AWS ParallelCluster is an AWS supported Open Source cluster management
tool to deploy and manage HPC clusters in the AWS cloud.

dependent_to.name: py-pyprof2html
dependent_to.description: Python cProfile and hotshot profile's data to HTML Converter

dependent_to.name: py-gcovr
dependent_to.description:
Gcovr provides a utility for managing the use of the GNU gcov utility
and generating summarized code coverage results. This command is
inspired by the Python coverage.py package, which provides a similar
utility for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-cookiecutter
dependent_to.description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.

dependent_to.name: py-fava
dependent_to.description:
Fava is a web interface for the double-entry bookkeeping software
Beancount with a focus on features and usability.

dependent_to.name: py-flask
dependent_to.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.

dependent_to.name: qgis
dependent_to.description:
QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic
information system application that supports viewing, editing, and
analysis of geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-batchspawner
dependent_to.description:
This is a custom spawner for Jupyterhub that is designed for
installations on clusters using batch scheduling software.

dependent_to.name: py-torch-geometric
dependent_to.description:
PyTorch Geometric (PyG) is a geometric deep learning extension library
for PyTorch. It consists of various methods for deep learning on graphs
and other irregular structures, also known as geometric deep learning,
from a variety of published papers. In addition, it consists of an easy-
to-use mini-batch loader for many small and single giant graphs, multi
gpu-support, a large number of common benchmark datasets (based on
simple interfaces to create your own), and helpful transforms, both for
learning on arbitrary graphs as well as on 3D meshes or point clouds.

dependent_to.name: py-notebook
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Interactive Notebook

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab
dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.

dependent_to.name: py-bokeh
dependent_to.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server
dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependent_to.name: py-pycbc
dependent_to.description:
PyCBC is a software package used to explore astrophysical sources of
gravitational waves. It contains algorithms to analyze gravitational-
wave data from the LIGO and Virgo detectors, detect coalescing compact
binaries, and measure the astrophysical parameters of detected sources.
PyCBC was used in the first direct detection of gravitational waves and
is used in the flagship analysis of LIGO and Virgo data.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterhub
dependent_to.description: Multi-user server for Jupyter notebooks.

dependent_to.name: opencv
dependent_to.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx
dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependent_to.name: py-brian2
dependent_to.description: A clock-driven simulator for spiking neural networks

dependent_to.name: py-hpcbench
dependent_to.description: Define and run your benchmarks

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows
dependent_to.description: Common workflows for MRI (anatomical, functional, diffusion, etc)

dependent_to.name: py-nbconvert
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook Conversion

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description: Snakemake is an MIT-licensed workflow management system.

dependent_to.name: py-numpydoc
dependent_to.description: numpydoc - Numpy's Sphinx extensions

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server
dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications

dependent_to.name: py-rpy2
dependent_to.description:
rpy2 is a redesign and rewrite of rpy. It is providing a low-level
interface to R from Python, a proposed high-level interface, including
wrappers to graphical libraries, as well as R-like structures and
functions.
